description:
The three visit the student council president to demand that their film be accepted for the cultural festival. The president, meanwhile, is busy trying to get the vice president to let her visit the boys school across the street.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Au revoir, présidente / Projet sorcière du club occulte / Visage létal
Goodbye, Student Council President / Oka-ken Witch Project / Face of Mass Destruction
Sayonara Seitokaichou / Okaken Witch Project / Ganmen Kyouki
さよなら生徒会長 / オカケン・ウィッチ・プロジェクト / 顔面凶器
